price: И учврстили смо његово царство и дали му мудрост и способност да расуђује.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
